cleaned_text: Part 1 Vibrations of Light: Using Gemstones and Crystals for Healing and Protection Below is full lecture outline (Friday lectures are just an Introduction) Mani dharana vidhi means the science of gemstones, which operates through the gem's vibrations of light and unfolds significant energetic and healing effects. On the physical level, gemstones can pacify the doshas. Energetically, gemstones can heal the auric field by providing the particular vibrations of light needed by a person due to astrological factors. When one wears a stone related to a particular planet, it attracts only the light particles coming from that planet. In this brand new weekend seminar with Vasant Lad, BAM&S, MASc, we will discover how to use the "frozen light" of gems and crystals to awaken inner light. Discuss the ancient Vedic roots of mani dharana vidhi, learn how to wear the proper stone as a ring or pendant for pleasing planets and balancing health, and explore how to best bring the beauty and healing energy of stones and crystals to your home environment. Participate in a hands-on crystal healing practicum with your classmates and learn how to use crystals and stones to balance the chakras; a simple technique you can use on friends, family, clients, and yourself.
